context_bundle.summary: Leader election chooses single coordinator from cluster: Use Raft/Paxos consensus (etcd, Consul), or lease-based election (Redis, ZooKeeper). Leader handles coordination, followers standby. Automatic failover if leader fails. Use heartbeats to detect leader liveness.

onboarding.quick_start: Leader election chooses single coordinator from cluster: Use Raft/Paxos consensus (etcd, Consul), or lease-based election (Redis, ZooKeeper). Leader handles coordination, followers standby. Automatic failover if leader fails. Use heartbeats to detect leader liveness.
